ferrn 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Reference

Main plotting functions

Main diagnostic plotting functions

explore_trace_search()

Plot the count in each iteration

explore_trace_interp()

Plot the trace the search progression

flip_sign() compute_pca() explore_space_pca()

Flip the sign of a group of bases

prep_space_tour() explore_space_tour()

Plot the grand tour animation of the projection bases space

Get components

Extracting components from existing data object

get_anchor()

Extract the anchor points on the geodesic path

get_basis_matrix()

Extract all the bases as a matrix

get_best()

Extract the record with the largest index value

get_dir_search()

Extract directional search points during the optimisation

get_interp()

Extract interpolated records

get_interp_last()

Extract the end point at each interpolation

get_interrupt()

Extract the end point of the interpolation and the target point in the iteration when an interruption happens

get_search()

Extract search points during the optimisation

get_search_count()

Extract the count in each iteration

get_space_param()

Estimate the radius of the background circle based on the randomly generated points

get_start()

Extract the starting records

get_theo()

Extract the theoretical best basis, if applicable

Bind additionals

Bind external data to the existing data object

bind_random()

Bind random bases in the projection bases space

bind_random_matrix()

Bind random bases in the projection bases space as a matrix

bind_theoretical()

Bind the theoretical best record

Create ggprotos

ggproto for drawing each component in PCA plot

add_anchor()

A ggproto for drawing anchor points

add_anno()

A ggproto for annotating the symmetry of the starting points

add_dir_search()

A ggproto for drawing directional search points

add_end()

A ggproto for drawing start points

add_interp()

A ggproto for drawing interpolation path

add_interp_last()

A ggproto for drawing finish points

add_interrupt()

A ggproto for annotating the interrupted path

add_search()

A ggproto for drawing search points

add_space()

A ggproto for drawing circle

add_start()

A ggproto for drawing start points

add_theo()

A ggproto for drawing the theoretical basis, if applicable

Color & theme

An australian botanical color palette

botanical_palettes

A customised color palette based on australian botanicals

botanical_pal()

Color interpolation

scale_color_continuous_botanical()

continous scale color function

scale_color_discrete_botanical()

Discrete scale color function

scale_fill_continuous_botanical()

continous scale fill function

scale_fill_discrete_botanical()

discrete scale fill function

theme_fern()

A specific theme for trace plots

In-built data

Simulated example data

holes_1d_geo holes_1d_better holes_2d_better holes_2d_better_max_tries boa boa5 boa6

Simulated data

Miscellaneous

Other misc functions

clean_method()

Clean method names

format_label()

Better label formatter to avoid overlapping
